code: var _require=require("../../config"),API=_require.API;export var getAllCategories=function getAllCategories(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getall")).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var getCategoryDetails=function getCategoryDetails(id){return fetch("".concat(API,"/getCategoryDetails/").concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var addCategory=function addCategory(category_name,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/addcategory"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({category_name:category_name})}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var updateCategory=function updateCategory(id,category_name,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/updatecategory/").concat(id),{method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({category_name:category_name})}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var deleteCategory=function deleteCategory(id,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/deletecategory/").concat(id),{method:"DELETE",headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};
